programme.title: Intervention
programme.desc: A talented cook quickly becomes a drug courier and an addict after a close family friend introduces her to oxycodone.

programme.title: Intervention
programme.desc: A paranormal expert risks joining the entities he speaks to due to his habitual consumption of vodka and easy access to opiates.

programme.title: Intervention
programme.desc: A woman with a bright future becomes addicted to heroin after she reconnects with her biological father.

programme.title: Intervention
programme.desc: The owner of a funeral home turns to alcohol to cope with the trauma he experienced recovering the bodies of victims in the Oklahoma City bombing.

programme.title: Intervention
programme.desc: A bright college student with dreams of becoming a journalist is abducted and brutally assaulted, causing her to become dependent on a dangerous mix of drugs to mask the trauma.

programme.title: Intervention
programme.desc: The shocking death of a sister, the diagnosis of a progressive and debilitating disease, and an unexpected divorce sends a once-vivacious fitness model and bodybuilder down a path of meth-fueled binges.

programme.title: Intervention
programme.desc: A successful businessman who underwent back surgery develops a life-threatening addiction to pain pills and hand sanitizer.

programme.title: Intervention

programme.title: Tattoo Age

programme.title: Tattoo Age

programme.title: America on Drugs
programme.desc: American cities are exploding with drug violence as the Clinton administration opens the door for Mexican cartels and ramps up prison sentences; an unlikely meth queen rises, and a crime lord takes vengeance.

programme.title: America on Drugs
programme.desc: After 9/11, heroin lords and terrorists forged an unholy alliance; Afghanistan is a Narco state; El Chapo goes on the run; Big Pharma becomes the new big drug lord as Americans get addicted and ponder if the war on drugs is worth it.

programme.title: Cults and Extreme Belief
programme.desc: A former recruiter for multilevel marketing self-help group NXIVM, Sarah Edmondson exposes the organization as a destructive sex cult in October 2017 and works to support the criminal prosecution of the cult's leader, Keith Raniere.

programme.title: Cults and Extreme Belief
programme.desc: Despite their hippie persona and rustic community businesses, the Twelve Tribes stand accused of abusing children and subjugating women; disconnected from her family, ex-member Samie Brosseau works to expose the organization's abusive practices.

programme.title: Cults and Extreme Belief
programme.desc: Former ``Moonie`` Teddy Hose attempts to alert the public to a gun-obsessed Unification Church offshoot known as the Sanctuary Church of Newfoundland, Penn., which preaches an extreme gospel and guns at the center of worship.

programme.title: Cults and Extreme Belief
programme.desc: Amy Bril recounts her childhood growing up in the Children of God, a group notorious for pedophilia and religious prostitution; Amy and others born and raised in the group band together to address a suicide epidemic among fellow survivors.

programme.title: Cults and Extreme Belief
programme.desc: Forced into child labor, physical abuse and squalid living conditions while growing up in the United Nation of Islam, Elijah Muhammad seeks justice for himself and the other children abused by UNOI and the teachings of its leader, Royall Jenkins.

programme.title: Cults and Extreme Belief

programme.desc: The father of an accomplished moose hunter and long-time Yukon resident, Brent has never taken a good bull moose. Greg and Brent set out to change that when they fly into a remote backcountry lake in Canada's Yukon at the very peak of the moose rut.

programme.title: Steve's Outdoor Adventures
programme.desc: Steve West shoots several popular bullets into gel blocks to show you how they truly perform on impact, with real life hunting action included.

programme.title: The Western Hunter
programme.desc: Years of effort culminate in the rugged mountains of Nevada's public lands on Nate's archery mule deer hunt.

programme.title: Backwoods Life
programme.desc: Michael Lee and Kevin Knighton are taking a look back at some of their most memorable whitetail bucks of the season and lessons learned along the way.

programme.title: Where the Wild Men Are with Ben Fogle
programme.desc: Ben ventures off the wild coast of Northern Ireland to the remote and rugged island of Rathlin. He stays with 41-year-old Rauri Morgan, a former HR executive who turned his back on corporate life.

programme.title: Food Factory
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes look at strawberry shortcake ice cream, delectable tacitos are hand-rolled by the hundreds, marshmallow-making in a race against time, and a broccoli slaw that is washed twice.

programme.title: Food Factory
programme.desc: See the production of irresistible protein-packed breakfast cereal; artisanal cream soda; vegan mayonnaise; and a quarter of a million churros that are dusted with cinnamon and flash-fried.

programme.title: Russia with Simon Reeve
programme.desc: Simon meets a remote Siberian mountain community that worships a former traffic cop who claims to be the reincarnation of Jesus Christ, and visits a largely Muslim region that's plagued by terrorism and jihadist violence.

programme.title: Tribal Bootcamp
programme.desc: The remote Xavante tribe in Brazil place a high value on strength and masculinity. They teach Joel how to work through the pain barrier before he takes part in a gruelling race.

programme.title: Wild Japan

programme.desc: Rick journeys the majestic Camel Estuary to one of Britain's finest vineyards, before casting his line to hook Britain's fastest fish and learning about Tim Smit's ambitious new idea for Cornwall.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School
programme.desc: Watch a milestone moment when two students get their first forest time in years. And another pair of students are confined to the school’s clinic after an accident in the forest leaves Beni with a broken leg and Lala with a broken elbow.

programme.title: Stormborn
programme.desc: Welcome autumn to the north Atlantic, when its animals struggle to prepare for winter. Trace the grey seals’ mating frenzy and witness the horrific price one seal pup must pay. Then see reindeer undertake a perilous swim along their migration path.

programme.title: Tales From Zambia
programme.desc: Some animals survive with a little help from their friends. Witness the ways buffalo, lions, hyenas, wild dogs, and even some birds work together to help each other protect their offspring, overcome predators, hunt, and defend their territory.

programme.title: Africa's Claws & Jaws
programme.desc: Sharks are among the planet’s oldest and most highly evolved predators. Along the coast of southern Africa, pioneers dedicate their lives to learning more about these fascinating creatures and spreading awareness about their plight.

programme.title: Africa's Claws & Jaws
programme.desc: Lurking in the shadows of Africa is an incredible diversity of reptiles we seldom see. Masters of the underworld, these snakes and lizards have conquered almost every habitat on the continent while evolving a remarkable set of adaptations to survive.

programme.title: In For The Kill
programme.desc: It’s one of the most dramatic events in the natural world. When a predator goes In For the Kill prey scatters, dust flies, and claws and teeth draw red. But how do nature’s killing machines pull off these epic feats of speed, cunning and agility? Some use stealth to hide in plain sight. Camouflaged markings and hidden tunnels give some predators the opportunity to deliver their lethal strike.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters
programme.desc: Enter the heart of Zambia’s Luangwa Valley, where shady woodlands and antelope-packed plains offer the perfect hunting grounds for an audacious female leopard named Olimba and the pack she must struggle to control.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters
programme.desc: The Nsefu lion pride welcomes seven new cubs during the wet season, when antelope and buffalo are spread far from the river, making them harder to hunt. Learn how the mother lionesses work to keep the boisterous cubs alive.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters
programme.desc: Twin brothers with a powerful bond have ruled the Nsefu pride for three years. They’re fathers to all the young, and protectors of their territory. Witness the struggle that unfolds when rival males target their territory.

programme.title: Dawn To Dusk
programme.desc: Follow penguins, iguanas, tortoises, frogs, and tamarins from Mexico to Peru and as far west as the Galapagos Islands as they live out their daily dramas, affected by the sun’s heat, looming predators, and hazardous weather conditions.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School
programme.desc: Watch a milestone moment when two students get their first forest time in years. And another pair of students are confined to the school’s clinic after an accident in the forest leaves Beni with a broken leg and Lala with a broken elbow.

programme.title: Life's Journey
programme.desc: Surviving infancy presents the greatest challenge for nearly every species on earth. The balance between life and death is easily tipped in the wilds of Africa, where animals must grow and learn quickly to make it through the first stage of life.

programme.title: Life's Journey
programme.desc: Young animals in Zambia face the great challenge of reaching maturity in order to breed, and every lesson learned could mean the difference between life and death. Coming of age for these creatures requires skill, strength, courage, and copious luck.

programme.title: Stormborn
programme.desc: Welcome autumn to the north Atlantic, when its animals struggle to prepare for winter. Trace the grey seals’ mating frenzy and witness the horrific price one seal pup must pay. Then see reindeer undertake a perilous swim along their migration path.

programme.title: Tales From Zambia
programme.desc: Some animals survive with a little help from their friends. Witness the ways buffalo, lions, hyenas, wild dogs, and even some birds work together to help each other protect their offspring, overcome predators, hunt, and defend their territory.

programme.title: Volcanic Odysseys
programme.desc: Tom explores how volcanoes have influenced Mexico’s people and history. See how volcanic eruptions have destroyed ancient cultures-and how their unique landscapes have given rise to one of the world’s most famous alcoholic beverages.

programme.title: Volcanic Odysseys
programme.desc: Join Tom on a dangerous adventure to two of the most active volcanoes in Indonesia, where he’s greeted with otherworldly landscapes filled with toxic gases, fire, and brimstone that inspired mythological visions of hell.

programme.title: Dawn To Dusk
programme.desc: Follow penguins, iguanas, tortoises, frogs, and tamarins from Mexico to Peru and as far west as the Galapagos Islands as they live out their daily dramas, affected by the sun’s heat, looming predators, and hazardous weather conditions.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries
programme.desc: Witness the troubles that arise after a once-in-a-generation drought has sucked all the moisture from surrounding rivers. The conservationists struggle to keep up with the number of thirsty animals as some succumb and others survive.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries
programme.desc: Explore eco-tourism, the financial backbone that keeps the park operating. Visit the varying accommodations, from comfortable camping to luxurious lodgings, and see how guests are living amongst nature and even assist in tracking wildlife.

programme.title: Life's Journey
programme.desc: Surviving infancy presents the greatest challenge for nearly every species on earth. The balance between life and death is easily tipped in the wilds of Africa, where animals must grow and learn quickly to make it through the first stage of life.

programme.title: Volcanic Odysseys
programme.desc: Join Tom on a dangerous adventure to two of the most active volcanoes in Indonesia, where he’s greeted with otherworldly landscapes filled with toxic gases, fire, and brimstone that inspired mythological visions of hell.

programme.title: Nature Scenes
programme.desc: One half hour of uninterrupted aerials from Gros Morne National Park. Glide across mountains, forests, cliffs and waterfalls and explore the East Coast of Canada in stunning detail.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries
programme.desc: Watch staff soothe a wild baby rhino after her mother is illegally shot. It’s a dire situation, and the calf will have to be hand-raised. Also, meet a 4-year-old captive rhino that went through the same thing and is now entering a new life stage.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries
programme.desc: See the staff quickly treat an ailing eland suffering from a wound caused by an illegal trap. After the massive creature is cared for, the staff must work to herd a baby hartebeest back to her main group of antelope.

programme.title: Dawn To Dusk
programme.desc: See how creatures from the Tibetan plateau, to the lush rainforests of Thailand, to Vietnam’s twisted mangroves, survive four extra hours of daylight once a year, searching for food, fighting for dominance, and raising their families.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School
programme.desc: Beni and Lala are going stir crazy in the sick bay, but they must recover before returning to the rough and tumble of class. And at forest school, a termite-foraging lesson inspires class clown Valentino to make a finger-licking discovery.

programme.title: Battle Of The Alphas
programme.desc: Madagascar is home to strange animals not found anywhere else on Earth. When these animals fight for supremacy, their battles are just as strange -- from weird neck-wrestling weevils to ring tailed lemur moms that go into battle with baby on board.

programme.title: Battle Of The Alphas
programme.desc: Australia is home to an eclectic array of creatures, and the ways to succeed as an alpha are just as diverse. The beach turns into a dueling ground, and the outback becomes a boxing ring, as animals face off with their own kind.

programme.title: Tales From Zambia
programme.desc: Safety is scarce in the Zambian wilderness, where predators hide in the shadows. With a bull hippo struck down in his prime, a young lion discovered in the bush, and a massive buffalo snuffed out in the mud, the chase is on to identify the culprit.

programme.title: Nature Scenes
programme.desc: One half hour of uninterrupted footage from Gros Morne National Park. Fly over the edge of 600 metre high cliffs to discover some of the world’s tallest waterfalls up close.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild
programme.desc: Since the 1900's, this uninhabited island in Lake Superior has been a constant battleground between moose and wolves. Join a band of volunteers as they scour the island for moose bones, trying to piece together population numbers after a long winter.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild
programme.desc: As far as invasive species go, Asian carp are some of the nastiest around. See how they've made their way up America's waterways by eating voraciously, breeding quickly, and decimating native fish populations.

programme.title: Dawn To Dusk
programme.desc: See how one animal family’s tragedy is another’s holiday dinner as New Zealand’s mainland and island creatures, including penguins, flightless birds, sea lions, and sharks, battle to feed and protect their young in this marine environment.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School
programme.desc: Join two seriously ill orangutans in the medical clinic, where Erik’s head infection is causing concern and fourteen-year-old Mia’s life depends on a blood transfusion. Outside the clinic, the infants find a secret treat hidden inside a rubber tree.

programme.title: Battle Of The Alphas
programme.desc: The African savanna is an epic landscape, and whether it’s head-bashing hippos, hormone-crazed elephants or dueling lions, battles that rage on the savanna are just as epic.

programme.title: Battle Of The Alphas
programme.desc: Welcome to India - a land of exotic animals and exotic warfare. Monkeys stage dusty dust-ups, blackbucks wage open war on the open plains, and peacock dandies swing switchblades: these are colorful battles worthy of a vibrant land.

programme.desc: Visit animals in three extraordinary habitats: a baby giraffe takes its first steps in the sweltering Luangwa Valley, two thousand baboons have found a paradise in a Kasanka forest, and a cheetah family prowls for meat on the desolate Liuwa Plain.

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries
programme.desc: Follow Kenyan capture teams to the Somali border to catch 50 rare and endangered antelope that need to be relocated into a predator-free conservancy. With no roads and the two nations at war, the operation must be carried out by helicopter.

programme.title: Dawn To Dusk
programme.desc: See how one animal family’s tragedy is another’s holiday dinner as New Zealand’s mainland and island creatures, including penguins, flightless birds, sea lions, and sharks, battle to feed and protect their young in this marine environment.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School

programme.title: Labdarúgás - Olasz Bajnokság (?)
programme.desc: (Ismétlés). A Serie A Olaszország legjobb klubcsapatai számára rendezett labdarúgó-bajnokság. Jelenlegi formáját az 1929–1930-as idénytől tartják számon. Azóta 2 idény kivételével rendszeresen megrendezésre kerül. A Serie A-t a világ egyik legerősebb pontvadászati lehetőségének tartják.

programme.title: Tempó-magazin (?)
programme.desc: (Ismétlés). A Tempó Autósport Magazin több mint húsz éve szállítja a híreket, a verseny összefoglalókat elsősorban a magyar autósportról ugyanakkor időről-időre kitekint a nemzetközi porondra is, leginkább azokra az eseményekre, ahol magyar versenyzők indulnak. A legfontosabb, legnézettebb futamok első helyen szerepelnek a Tempó kínálatában, így a rali, a rallycross számít a legfontosabb eseménynek a szerkesztőség életében. Emellett beszámolnak a gyorsasági bajnokság, a tereprali, az autocross futamok történéseiről is.

programme.title: Trash Talk (?)
programme.desc: (Ismétlés). Amerikai sportokkal foglalkozó talkshow különleges sportágakkal, egyedi témákkal. A műsorvezető mellett öt állandó szakértő segít tájékozódni többek között a legnépszerűbb amerikai profi ligák fontos eseményei között, de részesei lehetünk az Amerikában oly népszerű küzdősport-eseményeknek, akár az UFC által szervezett ketrecharcgáláknak is.

programme.title: S.E.F.T. (?)
programme.desc: A DIGI Sport új, napi rendszerességgel jelentkező magazinműsora komoly küldetéssel indul útjára. Célunk, hogy olyan inspiráló személyeket mutassunk be, akik _ legyenek akár profi vagy hobbisportolók, fiatalok vagy idősek, hírességek vagy civilek _ minden nap tesznek valamit az egészségükért. A műsorban nagyító alá vesszük a szereplők általános szemléletmódját, táplálkozását, sportolási szokásait, valamint ellessük apró praktikáikat, amelyekkel be tudják illeszteni a sportos, egészséges és fitt, azaz a #sefter életmódot rohanó hétköznapjaikba.

programme.title: A nap hőse (?)
programme.desc: Nem csak idősebb korunkra válhatunk példaképpé, sokan már tizenévesen azok lesznek! A DIGI Sport minisorozata olyan fiatal tehetségeket mutat be, akik teljesítményükkel, eredményeikkel kiemelkednek a kortársaik közül. A minisorozat különálló, 5-7 perces epizódjaiban ilyen fiatalokról láthatnak portrékat a nézőink. Az egyes portrékban bemutatjuk a főszereplőt, megismerjük a sportágát, megkérdezzük tapasztalatairól, bemutatjuk az eddig elért eredményeit, megmutatjuk környezetét, betekintünk edzéseire, megismerjük és meghallgatjuk az edzőjét és akár hozzátartozóit, családját is.

programme.title: Hard Knocks Fighting, Ep. 11
programme.desc: HKFC is one of the world’s premier MMA promotions, showcasing elite up and coming athletes on a global stage. With over 50 events, HKFC, has earned a reputation of being a world class organization, through its global audience and draw of talent. Athletes such as Ronda Rousey, Elias Theodorou, and Misha Cirkunov used HKFC as a staging ground for their UFC careers.

programme.title: Rxf Mma Championship, Romania, 04.11.2019
programme.desc: Real Xtreme Fighting (RXF), the largest promotion in Romania and the undisputed leader in the organization of events dedicated to Mixed Martial Arts (MMA), is pleased to invite you on RXF Gala.

programme.title: Goldenfighter Kickboxing Championship, Romania Vs. Holland, Timisoara, Romania, 24.06.2021
programme.desc: Golden Fighter Kickboxing Championship 5 - Romania VS China event is taking place on August 24th in Mamaia-Romania, featuring fighters such as Bogdan Stoica or Hua Guanghua. In the main fight we will see Andrei Stoica vs. Clyde Brunswijk and in the title fight Cristian Milea vs. Kamara Madicke.

programme.title: Punch Down 2, Poznań, Poland, 07.03.2020
programme.desc: WHAT IS PUNCHDOWN? The main idea of the competition is to have fun! Participants compete with each other on the rules of the knockout stage (bracket) in 1vs1 duels, hitting each other on the cheek with an open hand, maximum 3 blows per person. The winner is decided by a knock-out or a judge's verdict.

programme.title: Colosseum Tournament, 20.08.2021
programme.desc: An exceptional show of sound and lights, kickboxing and MMA gala, in which we will have fighters from Romania and beyond. A gala where heroes of martial arts from Romania will meet some of the strongest opponents.

programme.title: New Snake Pit 2017
programme.desc: NEW Wrestling's (New European Championship Wrestling) most hardcore event of the year. The word “violence” has a whole new meaning when top NEW stars and international talent meet in extreme stipulation matches.

programme.title: Ece 5 Enfusion Xtreme Standup, Alkmaar, Netherlands, 16.07.2021
programme.desc: Enfusion Kickboxing is one of the world’s top Kickboxing organizations. Live events take place all over the world and include Enfusion Live and Enfusion Talent which are both full events of about 2 hours held on the same night. Enfusion represents the highest quality kickboxing in the world, as their shows constantly feature the best and most exciting line-ups possible. The exciting atmosphere, spectacular action and jaw-dropping KO's are the main reason tor the brand's success. Enfusion is a must-see event for all combat sports enthusiasts.

programme.title: Hip Show
programme.desc: Hip Show takes combat sports to a whole new level. The fights are 2-on-2 (two teams of two fighters each) in a 3D 12x12 meters arena rather than inside a conventional flat ring. If one of the team members in the arena drops out after a knockout, the fight continues in a 2 versus 1 format. If the remaining team member can hold out for 60 seconds, the bout ends in a tie.

programme.title: Lnk Boxing Night 5, Arena Riga, 11.11.2017
programme.desc: This international professional boxing event took place in Riga (Latvia) on November 11, 2017. During the event, ten fights were held in various weight categories. The fights featured fighters from Latvia, Russia, Belarus, Serbia, and Poland. In the fight of the evening, Yerzhan Zalilov (Kazakhstan) fought with Jaba Memishishi (Georgia).

programme.title: Lnk Boxing Night 6, Arena Riga, 17.03.2018
programme.desc: This international professional boxing event took place in Riga (Latvia) on March 17, 2018. During the event, ten fights were held in various weight categories. The fights featured fighters from Latvia, Russia, Belarus, Serbia, and Poland.

programme.title: Fighting Rookies 2014
programme.desc: Fighting Rookies is a competition with a unique chance for a kickboxer to clim the ladder of success in his sport. The Rookies compete for a chance to become professionals and get the experience needed to succeed at the highest level. Each fighter gives his best to turn his dream into reality. What they do today builds their future and echoes into eternity!

programme.title: Bangkok Fight Night
programme.desc: Located in the impressive MBK Center in the heart of the Bangkok shopping district, thousands flock to witness the incredible Muay Thai events put on by Bangkok Fight Night every week. The combination of the unique location, hard hitting action and curious onlookers make Bangkok Fight Night an unforgettable experience. Don’t miss the “Science of the Eight Limbs” direct from Thailand!

programme.title: Cffc
programme.desc: Cage Fury Fighting Championships, America’s top regional MMA promotion, once again returns to live action on FightBox HD on Saturday May 21st (Sunday morning May 22nd CET) for CFFC 58. Catch all the best live MMA action from the Borgata Hotel, Casino and Spa in Atlantic City, New Jersey, USA. Don’t miss this incredible mixed martial arts show from one of the biggest platforms for MMA fighters who later make it big in the UFC.
